About us

We create and package amazing tours in Johannesburg.

  • Home
  • About us
  • Page active

"Jozy Triangel"

Jozy Triangel is a company that has experienced the heart of the people, that is why every tour is not only designed but a genuine life experience. We specialize in the art of tours, as well as providing art on tours.

We expand to a variety of experiences from walking tours, historical and Heritage tours, fashion tours, literary, art and musical tours, city sightseeing and tailor made/customized tours that focus on present-day South Africa.

We believe in fusion because South Africa is a melting pot for many nations. We go the extra mile to make sure your family and friends have memorable experiences.

Jozy Triangel is curious, ready to listen then execute your needs. We provide you with guides that are not only informative, but they also come with experience in their field. The recognition and care between you, the guide and the communities is real. Every experience is filled with so much life, fun, knowledge, and love that will make you discover a new you.

Book Now

Some good reasons

We are, arts and culture guides, we showcase and uplift the local aforementioned sector.

  • A unique set of tours
  • Only the best guides
  • Sustainable tourism

Making a positive socio-economic impact by ensuring that all stakeholders directly benefit from tourism activities is important to us. Ground operators, local entrepreneurs and SME’s (Small medium enterprises) sustain local tourism thus it is our responsibility to establish a link that provides a sustainable revenue stream for the local economy.

What our customers are saying

Júlia Dalóia

Nathaniel Richmond

"Bongani and King showed us the true beauty and transformation of their city, there seems to really be no other way to experience Joburg fully and as candidly!!"
